Reviews.Content: rome 3 days due extreme weather conditions snow beautiful attractions metro stations walking distance repeat clean owners veryvery helpful perfect hotel visiting city practicing italian owner majority italians speaks basic english try french

Reviews.Title: “Good location, basic hotel”
Reviews.Author: Bone007
Reviews.Content: location close major attractions public transport easily accessible clean bathrooms tiny bit run italian standards breakfast ok owners friendly helpful beware speak english conversations bit difficult

Reviews.Title: “True Italian Family Hotel”
Reviews.Author: OnTourMrsJ
Reviews.Content: warm welcome awaits hotel run lovely family stayed night bad experience hotel road clean ensuite towels provided free wifi superb breakfast using google translate helps communicate italian isnt language

Reviews.Content: strongly recomend hotel friends loved family runs hotel wonderful warm people feel home help location nice close sights authentic roma wonderful coffee shop door hotel beautiful patio close famous ice cream shops roma wonderful authentic eat near bianco delicious

Reviews.Title: “Value for money, excellent location, tidy, most amicable staff”

Reviews.Content: liked hotel location walking distance santa maggiore centre 1015 min price value neat tidy private shower facilities tv inside amicable staff helpful excellent breakfasts friend definately recommend tourists home choose hotel visit elena natalie

Reviews.Title: “The worst value hotel I've ever stayed in.”
Reviews.Author: siamog
Reviews.Content: dont stay please dont youve searched cheap central option rome urge look guarantee miserable disappointing hotel youll misfortune shell pleasures look forward breakfast stale croissants looking fruit juice luxury woken nice elderly owner literally shouting greetings guests lively italian welcome relaxing stay rome clean owners son grandson helpful main issue 90 euro night expected hot water double bed booked neither wouldnt anticipated raging rant subject owner complained lack hot water suggested reduction rate apparently people complain 1976 fools rest

Reviews.Title: “Great place for the low budget traveller!”
Reviews.Author: Chezwawa
Reviews.Content: location ideal close major attractions easily accessible service hotel clean owners friendly helpful speak english prevented discussion stay comfortable breakfast sparse couldnt access wifi connection internet cafes eat close hotel hotel value amount charge dont expect luxury trimmings basic accommodation suited fine spent time sight seeing sleeping hotel
